project_descr: The Project aims to build capacities and strengthen policies and regulations for the effective implementation of the Viet Nam Green Growth Strategy and achieving sustainable development goals.

outputs.output_descr: Support the implementation of the Viet Nam Green Growth Strategy through capacity building and policy strengthening
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

outputs.output_descr: Support the implementation and monitoring of Sustainable Development Goals in Viet Nam

inst_descr: Dept. Sci Edu Nat Reserv & Env

EXTENSION International expert - study on investment of private sector in CC and green growth in Viet Nam
